planets.render

Class Camera

  • java.lang.Object
    • planets.render.Camera

  • public class Camera
extends java.lang.Object
    In charge of transferring coordinates from metric space to screen space.
    Author:
    David Cosby

    • Field Summary

      private Vector offset
      Camera center will be offset by this amount.
      private double pixelsPerKilometer
      Zoom factor.

      Coordinates at which the center of the camera will be aimed.

    • Field Detail

      • position

        private Vector position
        Coordinates at which the center of the camera will be aimed. (kilometers, kilometers)

      • getScreenDisplacementFromCenter

        public Vector getScreenDisplacementFromCenter(Vector location)
        Parameters:
        location - (kilometers, kilometers) vector that we want to map to screen space
        Returns:
        delta - location's coordinates on the screen (pixels, pixels), measured as distance from the center of the screen

      • getScreenPixelLength

        public double getScreenPixelLength(double kilometerLength)
        Parameters:
        kilometerLength - (kilometers)
        Returns:
        pixelLength - kilometerLength cast to screen space using the zoom factor

      • getVectorDisplacementFromPixelDisplacement

        public Vector getVectorDisplacementFromPixelDisplacement(Vector pixelDisplacement)
        Parameters:
        pixelDisplacement - (pixels, pixels)
        Returns:
        kilometerVector - pixelDisplacement cast to kilometer-scale vector using the zoom factor

      • getVectorLengthFromPixelLength

        public double getVectorLengthFromPixelLength(double pixelLength)
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        VectorLength - PixelLength cast to kilometers using the zoom factor
